author: smuzaffar
body: Use `cms_omds_adg` instead of temp `cmsonr_lb` . This shouod fix the random failures of `SiStripDAQ_O2O_test ` unit test. note that `cms_omds_adg` is part of official cern `tnsnames.ora` so this change will allow us to use official tnsnames.ora
title: use cms_omds_adg instead of temp tunnel cmsonr_lb
